item.description:
We usually meet on the SECOND Tuesday of the month.
Since it's going to be Valentine's Day, we've decided to move
our meetup to the THIRD Tuesday, 2/21.

******************************************************

Desirable relationships, as in ALL kinds of relationships, not just the romantic kind...

Jack Canfield & Joe Vitale, Master Teachers featured in The Secret, use this process everyday, every time they face experiences that are unattractive & undesirable. It’s Ho’oponopono….easy to learn, easy to use.

Ho'o...what? 

Ho'oponopono… it means "to make right". It is an ancient Hawaiian practice of reconciliation, forgiveness & ultimately, it heals.
 
Do you have relationships…with family, friends, colleague, lover, partner… that have gone off kilter? Are you left with regrets, with sadness, wondering whether you can attract desirable, sustainable, trusting relationships again?
 
You’ll learn
- how Ho'oponopono is validated by the concepts of quantum physics & Law Of Attraction
- how to clear & release any mental & emotional blocks and
- how to keep yourself "centered” in forgiveness, gratitude & love more easily, attracting the relationships your heart desires.
 
It is a special treat that we will be learning about Ho'oponopono from Kevin Martin, who trained with his NLP/Hypnosis mentor, who was personally trained by Morrnah Simeona, who trained Dr. Hew Len. Joe Vitale learned from Dr. Len the "attractiveness' of using Ho'oponopono. 

What a great way to wrap up the month of Love by clearing out “hurts, regrets, stuckness” to attract more desirable relationships.
 
Note: For folk who know about 4 phrase Ho'oponopono process, this is much, much more…

******************************************************
About Kevin Martin:
Website: www.poseffects.com
Contact: kenda_assoc@msn.com, 978-494-4542
 
Kevin Martin is an author (Perceive This!), speaker, certified hypnotherapist, master practitioner of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming), & personal development specialist. He has been helping people “help themselves” for many years with his skills in hypnosis, NLP, as well as various other mind-body modalities.  
 
His NLP/Hypnosis instructor & mentor was personally trained by Morrnah Simeona (honored as a "Living Treasure of Hawaii"), who trained Dr. Hew Len. Dr Len then trained Joe Vitale. Kevin is trained in Ho’oponopono & several other Huna techniques.  He brings his passion & knowledge to the subject.
 
Kevin is also the Organizer of the Hypnosis & NLP Meetups in Methuen, Lexington & Natick.
 

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

item.name: Clearing the Path to Attract Desirable Relationships
